modShortDescription: Make dyes craftable with this 7DTD mod. Dcsobral tried to make the ingredients make sense, so some of the dyes are actually more expensive than others.
modDescription:
Yeah, make [dyes](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-dye-mod/) craftable with this 7DTD mod. Dcsobral tried to make the ingredients make sense, so some of the dyes are actually more expensive than others. The cost matches the paint you get from scrapping them.

**[Download](https://github.com/dcsobral/7d2d/releases/download/2.0.0/Craftable.Dyes-1.0.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17350-dcsobrals-mods/).

**Credits:** [Dcsobral](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/dcsobral/)
